snippet.title: Teacher Killings Bring Profession's Risks To Light
snippet.description:
Teacher Killings Bring Profession's Risks To Light
By The Associated Press 08:32 AM EST 11/18/13
Recent killings of teachers in Mass., Nev., bring risks of profession to the forefront
http://www.thestreet.com/story/12113027/1/teacher-killings-bring-professions-risks-to-light.html

snippet.title: Celgene's Revlimid Makes Stronger Case for European Front-Line Approval
snippet.description:
Celgene's Revlimid Makes Stronger Case for European Front-Line Approval
By David Sobek 10:38 AM EST 11/13/13
New Revlimid data to be presented next month should convince European regulators to finally approve an important expansion into front-line multiple myeloma therapy.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/12107984/1/celgenes-revlimid-makes-stronger-case-for-european-front-line-approval.html
